Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("BuildProperty (Name = { Name }, Value = { Value }, FinalValue = { FinalValue }, Condition = { Condition })")

Docs.summary: Represents a single property in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project> object and uses the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Project.LoadXml%2A> method to add content to the project. The BuildProperty, <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection> classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project.
[!code-cs[msbuild_AddNewProperty#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/AddNewProperty/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_AddNewProperty#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/AddNewProperty/Module1.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty Clone(bool deepClone) cil managed

Docs.param: to create a deep copy of the ; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> references the same XML element as the original. Modifications to the name or value of a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies. However, depending on property evaluation, the two copies could have different <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.FinalValue%2A> property values.
A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> can be independently modified.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property.
Docs.value: Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property.

Docs.summary: Gets the final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.
Docs.value: The final value of the property after all property evaluations have been performed.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property was imported into the project.
Docs.value: if the property was imported into the project; otherwise, .
